text.div:
Uncorrected Chart Based Visual Acuity Screening

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    79878-5 Visual acuity uncorrected Right eye by ETDRS eye chart
    79879-3 Visual acuity uncorrected Left eye by ETDRS eye chart
    79882-7 Visual acuity uncorrected Right eye by Snellen eye chart
    79883-5 Visual acuity uncorrected Left eye by Snellen eye chart

name: Uncorrected Chart Based Visual Acuity Screening
